SEARCH
Package org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.tool

Klasse JavadocTool

java.lang.Object
com.sun.tools.javac.main.JavaCompiler
org.jdrupes.mdoclet.internal.tool.JavadocTool
public class JavadocTool extends com.sun.tools.javac.main.JavaCompiler
This class could be the main entry point for Javadoc when Javadoc is used as a component in a larger software system.

It provides operations to construct a new javadoc processor, and to run it on a set of source files.

      public static boolean isValidClassName(String s)

      Parameter:
